abstract: Zion Shohet, most recently with Citigroup, will oversee functions like relationships with trading partners, finance and accounting and cybersecurity.
snippet: Zion Shohet, most recently with Citigroup, will oversee functions like relationships with trading partners, finance and accounting and cybersecurity.
lead_paragraph: Elliott Management, the activist hedge fund run by Paul E.. Singer, has poached a top Citigroup executive to serve as its new chief operating officer, the firm announced in an internal memorandum on Friday.

headline.main: Activist Hedge Fund Elliott Hires Chief Operating Officer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
